select mid, mnick, pp, ccnt from (select m.id mid, m.nick mnick, nvl(p.cnt,0) pp, nvl(gx.cnt,0) ccnt, rownum rn from member m, (select id, count(*) cnt from member,participant where member.id = participant.pid group by id) p, (select id, count(*) cnt from member,gxgroup where member.id = gxgroup.ghost group by id) gx where m.id = p.id(+) and m.id = gx.id(+)) where rn between #s# and #e# and mid like #{id}
select id, nick from member where id like #{search} and id != #{id}
select id, nick from member where id = #{id}
select id, pass, nick, tel, favo, loc, birth, intro, gender, insta, fbook from member where id=#{value}
select pass from member where id=#{id}
